record.description: University of Chicago Varsity Football Squad, 1937. Fourth row: T. N. Metcalf, A. A. Goes Jr., H. Q. Petersmeyer, Prescott Jordan (assistant coach), Dr. C. E. Shannon, and Wallace Bock (trainer); third row: H. G. Irwin, R. D. Holmes, J. K. Goldsmith, R. J. Parsons, A. K. Shackleton, J. H. Palmer, P. H. Tatge, W. W. Schwiderski, C. Baran, and P. Gerba; second row: John Baker (assistant coach), Harold Blumer (assistant coach), R. G. Sass, G. S. Kelley, E. H. Pierce, R. W. Wasem, R. E. Meyer, J. L. Davenport, L. N. Letts, G. P. Antonic, C. D. Shaughnessy (coach), and J. K. Anderson (assistant coach); first row: S. Sherman, H. M. Kellogg, R. E. Johnson, T. P. Fink, J. M Fetman, R. E. Fitzgerald, K. C. Petersen, M. M. Goodstein, L. B. Hamity, E. H. Valorz, and R. J. Greenebaum.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
